data_table.description: Heart Failure Diagnosis Form, HDXA. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: 1 and 2 = Physicians review, 3 = Adjudicators review [Heart Failure Diagnosis Form, HDXA]

variable.name: HDXA1C_DAYS
variable.description: Date of HDX completion HDXA1C [Heart Failure Diagnosis Form, HDXA]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Heart Failure Diagnosis Form, HDXA]
